TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit Menu/MenuItemCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList

summary.span: 表示 对象集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类表示的集合对象存储在， ，或。This class represents the collection of objects stored in a , , or . 有关和类，该集合表示控件的整个菜单结构。For the and classes, this collection represents the entire menu structure for the control. 有关类，此集合表示与关联的子菜单项的列表。For the class, this collection represents the list of submenu items associated with the . 和方法使你能够添加和从集合中移除各个菜单项。The and methods enable you to add and remove individual menu items from the collection. 你还可以使用方法从集合中移除所有菜单项。You can also use the method to remove all the menu items from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类要求你将此集合关联与派生自的类，如， ，或类。This class requires that you associate the collection with a class that derives from , such as the , , or class. 由于你必须指定与此集合关联的菜单，你不能创建多个菜单项集合，并将它们关联与菜单根据需要。Since you must specify a menu that is associated with this collection, you cannot create multiple menu item collections and associate them with a menu as needed. 若要切换与菜单相关联的菜单项，必须清除的项的集合，并添加要向集合显示的菜单项。In order to switch the menu items associated with a menu, you must clear the collection of items and add the menu items to display to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A仅可包含在一个菜单一次，无法多次添加到同一个菜单。A can only be contained in one menu at a time, and cannot be added more than once to the same menu. 若要重用在多个菜单中，使用方法类。To reuse a in more than one menu, use the method of the class. 若要删除您之前添加，请使用方法。To remove a that you have previously added, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生的类创建主菜单中， `mainMenu1`，具有两个对象添加到其集合。The following code example uses the derived class to create a main menu, `mainMenu1`, that has two objects added to its collection. 在代码，然后将分配`mainMenu1`到属性。The code then assigns `mainMenu1` to the property of the . 此示例需要在此示例中定义的代码是与放在窗体中。This example requires that the code defined in this example is located with in a form. remarks.format: ## Remarks A仅可包含在一个菜单一次，无法多次添加到同一个菜单。A can only be contained in one menu at a time, and cannot be added more than once to the same menu. 若要重用在多个菜单中，使用方法类。To reuse a in more than one menu, use the method of the class. 若要删除您之前添加，请使用方法。To remove a that you have previously added, use the method. 此版本的方法允许你指定的标题的菜单项和一个委托来处理事件。This version of the method allows you to specify a caption for the menu item and a delegate to handle the event. 你可以使用此版本的方法如果你的应用程序已具有事件处理程序来处理事件。You can use this version of the method if your application already has an event handler to handle the event. > [!NOTE] > 事件不的引发其中包含子菜单项。The event is not raised for a that contains submenu items. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生的类创建主菜单中， `mainMenu1`，具有两个对象添加到其集合。The following code example uses the derived class to create a main menu, `mainMenu1`, that has two objects added to its collection. 该代码使用此版本的方法定义的事件处理程序事件的第二个菜单项添加到集合。The code uses this version of the method to define an event handler for the event of the second menu item added to the collection. 在代码，然后将分配`mainMenu1`到属性。The code then assigns `mainMenu1` to the property of the . 此示例要求在此示例中定义的代码位于窗体中。This example requires that the code defined in this example is located within a form. remarks.format: ## Remarks A仅可包含在一个菜单一次，无法多次添加到同一个菜单。A can only be contained in one menu at a time, and cannot be added more than once to the same menu. 若要重用在多个菜单中，使用方法类。To reuse a in more than one menu, use the method of the class. 若要删除您之前添加，请使用方法。To remove a that you have previously added, use the method. 此版本的方法允许你指定的标题的菜单项和委托将处理其事件。This version of the method allows you to specify a caption for the menu item and a delegate that will handle its event. 你可以使用此版本的方法如果你的应用程序已具有事件处理程序来处理事件。You can use this version of the method if your application already has an event handler to handle the event. 此版本的方法还允许你指定的数组以前创建你想要添加到集合的对象。This version of the method also allows you to specify an array of previously created objects that you want to add to the collection. 你可以使用此功能重用现有的使用克隆的对象方法。You can use this feature to reuse existing objects that have been cloned using the method. 如果`items`参数不为空或`null`、添加到集合将包含子菜单项。If the `items` parameter is not empty or `null`, the being added to the collection will contain submenu items. > [!NOTE] > 事件不的引发其中包含子菜单项。The event is not raised for a that contains submenu items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于清除整个集合从一个菜单的菜单项。You can use this method to clear the entire collection of menu items from a menu. 若要从集合中移除各个菜单项，使用方法。To remove an individual menu item from the collection, use the method. 若要添加新的对象添加到集合中，使用方法。To add new objects to the collection, use the method. ## Examples 在此示例中，创建主菜单中， `myMainMenu`，包含两个对象，`File`和`Edit`。In this example, you create a main menu, `myMainMenu`, with two objects, `File` and `Edit`. `File`菜单还拥有三个子菜单项， `New`， `Open`，和`Exit`。The `File` menu has three submenu items, `New`, `Open`, and `Exit`. 使用`Clear`方法中，删除所有中的对象`File`菜单集合。Using the `Clear` method, you remove all the objects in the `File` menu collection. 此程序要求你已创建名为`Form1`。This program requires that you have already created a named `Form1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于确定是否是其成员的集合，然后再尝试执行操作。This method enables you to determine whether a is member of the collection before attempting to perform operations on the . 你可以使用此方法以确认已添加到或仍是集合的成员。You can use this method to confirm that a has been added to or is still a member of the collection. ## Examples 在此示例中，创建主菜单中， `myMainMenu`，包含两个对象，`File`和`Edit`。In this example, you create a main menu, `myMainMenu`, with two objects, `File` and `Edit`. `File`菜单还拥有三个子菜单项， `New`， `Open`，和`Exit`。The `File` menu has three submenu items, `New`, `Open`, and `Exit`. 通过使用方法，可以检查以查看是否`File`菜单集合包含的项`Open`。By using the method, you check to see if the `File` menu collection contains the item `Open`. 如果项存在，请在文本框中显示结果。If the item exists, you display the result in a text box. 此程序要求你已创建名为`Form1`。This program requires that you have already created a named `Form1`. MemberSignature.Value: public int Count { get; }
.property instance int32 Count
Public ReadOnly Property Count As Integer
public: property int Count { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，通过该值指示集合中 对象的总数。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the total number of objects in the collection.

value.span: 集合中 对象的数目。

span.span: The number of objects in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Count`属性存储的数目分配给集合的对象。The `Count` property holds the number of objects assigned to the collection. 你可以使用`Count`作为上限的一个循环来循环访问集合的属性值。You can use the `Count` property value as the upper bounds of a loop to iterate through a collection. 请记住，集合的索引值是从零开始的索引，因此你必须从减去 1 循环变量。Keep in mind, the index value of a collection is a zero-based index, so you must subtract one from the looping variable. 如果你不考虑为此，将超过上限的集合，并引发异常。If you do not account for this, you will exceed the upper bounds of the collection and throw an exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建主菜单中， `myMainMenu`，具有一个， `File`，具有三个子菜单项： `New`， `Open`，和`Exit`。The following code example shows how to create a main menu, `myMainMenu`, with one , `File`, that has three submenu items: `New`, `Open`, and `Exit`. 使用`Count`属性，可以计算中的对象数`File`菜单并在消息框中显示此数量。Using the `Count` property, you count the number of objects in the `File` menu and display this number in a message box. 此示例需要你已创建名为`Form1`。This example requires that you have already created a named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[CountProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CountProperty/CPP/countitems.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CountProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CountProperty/CS/countitems.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CountProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CountProperty/VB/countitems.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建主菜单中， `myMainMenu`，包含两个对象，`File`和`Edit`。The following code example shows how to create a main menu, `myMainMenu`, with two objects, `File` and `Edit`. `File`菜单还拥有三个子菜单项： `New`， `Open`，和`Exit`。The `File` menu has three submenu items: `New`, `Open`, and `Exit`. 通过使用方法，可以检索的索引`Exit`中项`File`菜单集合，然后将其值显示在一个消息框。By using the method, you retrieve the index of the `Exit` item in the `File` menu collection, and then display its value in a message box. 此示例需要你已创建名为`Form1`。This example requires that you have already created a named `Form1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果连续，最后调用返回索引将首先，检查的键的匹配项，如果没有匹配项，从集合的开头开始搜索。If is called successively, the last returned index will be checked for a key match first, and if there is no match, the search starts at the beginning of the collection. 属性对应的密钥中。The property corresponds to the key for a in the . 键比较不区分大小写。The key comparison is not case-sensitive. 如果`key`参数是`null`或空字符串，或没有匹配项，返回-1。If the `key` parameter is `null` or an empty string, or there are no matches, returns -1.

span.span: The to remove.

summary.span: 从菜单项集合中移除指定的 。

span.span: Removes the specified from the menu item collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当从菜单项集合，所有后续的菜单项将上移集合中的一个位置删除。When a is removed from the menu item collection, all subsequent menu items are moved up one position in the collection. 你可以使用此版本的`Remove`删除特定使用的引用从集合要删除。You can use this version of the `Remove` to remove a specific from the collection using a reference to the to be removed. 如果你不具有对引用你想要删除，你可以使用接受索引对应于作为一个参数，此方法的其他版本要删除。If you do not have a reference to the that you want to remove, you can use the other version of this method that accepts, as a parameter, an index corresponding to the to be removed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建主菜单中， `myMainMenu`，包含两个对象，`File`和`Edit`。The following code example shows how to create a main menu, `myMainMenu`, with two objects, `File` and `Edit`. `File`菜单还拥有三个子菜单项： `New`， `Open`，和`Exit`。The `File` menu has three submenu items: `New`, `Open`, and `Exit`. 使用`Remove`方法，你移除`Open`项从`File`菜单集合。Using the `Remove` method, you remove the `Open` item from the `File` menu collection. 此示例需要你已创建名为`Form1`。This example requires that you have already created a named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[RemoveMenuItems#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RemoveMenuItems/CPP/removeitems.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RemoveMenuItems#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RemoveMenuItems/CS/removeitems.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RemoveMenuItems#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RemoveMenuItems/VB/removeitems.vb#1)]
